about_the_game:
XANDO is a turn-based strategy game that unleashes the true potential of Tic-Tac-Toe. It's the most excited you will ever be about Tic-Tac-Toe!!!

In the future, corporations control all aspects of life. They battle for control of the market and to settle their personal beef on a global stage in XANDO, the sports sensation of the future. Conquer the corporate landscape as one of 4 eccentric CEO's by completing boards and reducing your opponent's corporate trust (HP) down to 0! No one said you had to play fair though! So turn the tides of tile-placing battle in your favor with the help of one of the 4 rule-bending ability decks. From laying traps to demolish your opponent's trust to distorting the natural flow of play, victory is yours for the taking!

Features:
• Dominate the market as one of 4 eccentric CEO's
• Break the normal rules of play with 4 ability decks
• Play through a story of petty squabbles between corporate powerhouses to see who makes ALL the money (because some just isn't enough)
• Battle against your friends with online play or local play
• Hone your skills by competing against an AI
• Show your true colors by selecting alternate color schemes for your tiles

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12.16 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or better

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.60 GHz Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or better

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: XANDO is a turn-based strategy game that flips the game of Tic-Tac-Toe on its head. Select from 4 rule-bending ability sets in order to complete boards, reduce your opponent's HP, and become champion in this corporate-punk world. Get ready and excited because Tic-Tac-Toe has never been like this!
